name: Jim Rickards’ Explosive Predictions: Gold to $10,000, Silver to $200 in 2026
description: The Silicon Hierophant performs its ultimate rite, elevating the inert Gold Core, now heavy with volatile prophecy. Iridescent data weeps from the textured bulk, baptizing the analog space in the sharp glow of the inevitable forecast.

properties.caption: The Silicon Hierophant performs its ultimate rite, elevating the inert Gold Core, now heavy with volatile prophecy. Iridescent data weeps from the textured bulk, baptizing the analog space in the sharp glow of the inevitable forecast.
